newsitem.title: USA: TransAtlantic Holdings Q3 net rises.
newsitem.headline: TransAtlantic Holdings Q3 net rises.

text.p: (A) Represents net income less realized capital gains, net of income taxes.

Income before income taxes increased 17.8 percent to $50.6 million in the third quarter of 1996 versus $43.0 million in the same period of 1995. Included in these results are pre-tax realized capital gains of $4.3 million and $2.7 million in 1996 and 1995, respectively. For the first nine months of 1996, income before income taxes totaled $143.1 million versus $119.9 million for the comparable prior year period, an increase of 19.3 percent. Included in these results are pre-tax realized capital gains of $13.4 million and $8.0 million in 1996 and 1995, respectively.

Net premiums written in the third quarter of 1996 were $321.7 million, an increase of 15.4 percent from $278.8 million reported in the year ago quarter. For the first nine months of 1996, net premiums written increased 12.7 percent to $830.6 million from $737.2 million in the same prior year period. Guardian Re contributed $40.7 million to net premiums written for both 1996 periods.
